text: Giuseppe De'Longhi (born 24 April 1939) is an Italian billionaire businessman, and the president of De'Longhi. ==Early life== He was born in Treviso, Italy, on 24 April 1939. He graduated from Ca' Foscari University of Venice. ==Career== As of March 2020, he had a net worth estimated by Forbes at $3.1 billion. ==Personal life== He is married with two children and lives in Treviso, Italy. His son, Fabio De'Longhi, is CEO of De'Longhi. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Italian billionaires Category:People from Treviso Category:Ca' Foscari University of Venice alumni Category:De'Longhi
title: Giuseppe De'Longhi
